name: Undercry-project
tagline: All the afiliated things about us game. It's include the game source code, the engine, and others things like that.
body:
**# - Welcome on the "UnderCry Project" home-page.**

> All content here is free of rights until a undifined time, during this time, you shall put your nickname after your edit, because, when we're going to make the project private again, we'll just make a list of developpers who've participate.
> ***

## - Todo list :

1. ### - Engine |
_in C/C++ or in LUA._

2. ### - The Game Design Document |
_a simple GDD.txt with a untidy developpement of ideas. (With a GDD plan inside)_

3. ### - The game source code |
_A basic game source code or game-based code source copy. (free of rights)_

4. ### - The game ressources |
_Sounds, graphics, etc..._

5. ### - Others |
_All the others things._
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
